16a.definition: Calculated Ocean Surface currents (m/s) for each day using daily map of absolute dynamic topography (MADT) data from AVISO (SSALTO/DUACS user hand book-2009), gridded wind data from ASCAT (Bentamy et al., 2011) and SST data from AVHRR (Reynolds et al., 2007)
